availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Adam Stephens (Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, grocer. )

body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, grocer. Native of Hesse-Darmstadt. Married to Margaret Steiman Stephens in Jefferson County, Kentucky, in January 1845. Father of John Stephens. Grocer in Louisville in 1850. Grocer in Louisville in 1860. Indicted for grand larceny in Jefferson County in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville District 2, p. 140A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 4, p. 106.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film 000817889.
KYR-0001-004-1987.
